tool_description: Calculates experimental variograms and fits theoretical variogram models to quantify spatial correlation structure of geological variables for geostatistical analysis.

sample_data_path.description: Path to file containing sample locations and values

z_column.description: Column name for Z coordinates (for 3D variograms)

value_column.description: Column name containing the variable values

max_distance.description: Maximum distance for variogram calculation in meters

lag_distance.description: Lag distance for variogram bins in meters

directions.description: Directional angles in degrees for directional variograms

tolerance_angle.description: Angular tolerance for directional variograms in degrees

model_types.description: Theoretical variogram models to fit: spherical, exponential, gaussian, linear, power

nugget_effect.description: Whether to include nugget effect in variogram models

error_messages: Sample data file not found: Ensure the sample_data_path points to a valid data file.
Missing coordinate columns: Verify that x_column, y_column exist in the data.
Value column not found: The specified value_column must exist and contain numeric data.
Invalid distance parameters: max_distance and lag_distance must be positive numbers.
Invalid direction angles: Directional angles must be between 0 and 360 degrees.
Insufficient sample pairs: Need adequate sample pairs for reliable variogram calculation.
Unsupported model types: Use combinations of [spherical, exponential, gaussian, linear, power].
Invalid tolerance angle: tolerance_angle must be between 0 and 45 degrees.
usage: Provide sample data with coordinates and values, specify coordinate and value columns. Optionally set distance parameters, directions, and model types. The tool calculates experimental variograms and fits theoretical models.

total_pairs.description: Total number of sample pairs used in variogram calculation

experimental_variogram.description: Summary of experimental variogram points and statistics

best_fit_model.description: Best fitting theoretical variogram model and parameters

model_parameters.description: Model parameters: nugget, sill, range for the best fit model

goodness_of_fit.description: R-squared value indicating quality of model fit

variogram_summary.description: Comprehensive summary of variogram analysis and spatial structure interpretation
